means: 使变形，使残废，丑化( deform的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The patient may show an actual crater deforming indication of active disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 病人可以出现表现活动病变的真正龛影变形.

sentence.Network_en: He saw Jan as though someone had snatched a deforming mask from Jan's face.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看见了简的真面目,仿佛有人把一个歪曲形象的面具从简的脸上撕了下来.

sentence.Network_en: A hinged object can squash and stretch without deforming, e . g . Luxo, jr.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个铰对象可以压扁和拉伸而不变形, 例如:轿车, 大伙儿.

PerfectNetExp.abs: deform 变形deforming 使变形，致畸形的deforming arteritis 变形性动脉炎.

list.abs: 新编大学英语单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... conceited a. 自负的，骄傲自满的 deformity n. 畸形 departure n. 离开.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... definition 定义 deformity 残废 defy 不服.
石油英语词汇(D1) - 商务英语词汇 ... defoliate 落叶的 deformability 变形性 deformable coordinate 可变形坐标.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(二)|联想记忆法背单词 ... deflect v. 使偏离 deform v. 损伤，使变形，变坏 defraud v. 欺诈.
机械专业英语词汇（很全） - Lemon Tree ... 变形力 deforming force 变形 deformation 应力 stress.
形_百度百科 ... [闽南语]： heng5 形变【 deformation】 形骸【 the human skeleton or body】.

entry.tran: （使）变形;（使）成畸形;损毁…的外形
entry.def: If something deforms a person's body or something else, it causes it to have an unnatural shape. In technical English, you can also say that the second thing deforms.

example.tran: 严重的类风湿性关节炎会造成四肢变形。

example.ex: ...the ability of a metal to deform to a new shape without cracking.
example.tran: 金属重新塑形而不断裂的能力

auth_sentence.content: The middle is softer and dissipates energy by deforming.
auth_sentence.res_content: The middle is softer and dissipates energy by deforming.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The middle is softer and dissipates energy by deforming.

auth_sentence.content: The square...had mean little huts, deforming its ample space.
auth_sentence.res_content: The square...had mean little huts, deforming its ample space.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The square...had mean little huts, deforming its ample space.

auth_sentence.content: Destroying and deforming the name of Christianity, said Buru.
auth_sentence.res_content: Destroying and deforming the name of Christianity, said Buru.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Destroying and deforming the name of Christianity, said Buru.
